brand.name: GlixAI
brand.description: An advanced autonomous AI-powered career platform with a dark futuristic/sci-fi aesthetic.

usage_rules.headings: Uppercase, tracking-widest, font-bold or font-black. Use for H1, H2, H3.
usage_rules.body: Clean, high-legibility. Use for paragraphs, inputs, labels.
usage_rules.mono: Use for code snippets, data values, system logs, stats.

Button.styles: font-headings font-bold uppercase tracking-wider transition-all duration-300 relative overflow-hidden

variants.neon: bg-transparent border border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-black shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(0,242,255,0.2)]

variants.tech: bg-black/80 border-primary/20 relative before:absolute before:top-0 before:left-0 before:w-full before:h-[1px] before:bg-gradient-to-r before:from-transparent before:via-primary/50 before:to-transparent

Input.styles: bg-black/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 font-body text-white placeholder:text-gray-600 rounded-none h-12

Badge.styles: rounded-none font-mono text-xs uppercase tracking-widest border-none

backgrounds.description: Abstract neon lines forming a digital landscape
Abstract neon lines on a dark background

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text on neon backgrounds is typically black (#000000) for readability. White text on dark backgrounds must be > 4.5:1.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Respect prefers-reduced-motion for all heavy animations.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (primary: #00f2ff, etc) and fonts (Orbitron, Rajdhani).
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Modify components/ui to remove 'rounded-md' and replace with 'rounded-none' or custom clip-paths.
4. DARK MODE DEFAULT: Force dark mode. Do not implement light mode toggles unless explicitly requested.
5. USE GLASSMORPHISM: For sidebar, headers, and floating cards, use the 'glassmorphism' styles defined in visual_enhancers.
6. CHAT INTERFACE: Make the chat feel like a terminal/command center. Use monospace fonts for AI responses if technical.
7. NO GRADIENT TEXT ON INPUTS: Keep inputs readable (white text on dark bg).
8. TEST IDs: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
